Name: Succubus Farm
About the game: Play as a man captured by demons and forced to do manual labor. After some time, you can take no more and try to escape. But that's easier said than done! Avoid roaming patrols, hidden traps, and devious illusions in a mad dash for freedom! Features: A Dungeon Escape Action Game Sneak Past Patrolling Demons Avoid A Variety of Traps Multiple Environments Navigate the Labyrinth and Escape!

Meta Description: Looking for information on Succubus Farm? Check out the release date (Mar 19, 2021), developer insights from Dieselmine, and a complete game summary.
